stimulusHtml: A region in the plane is bounded by the graph of y = 1/x , the x-axis, the line x = m, and the line x = 2m, m > 0. The area of this region
choicesHtml: decreases as m increases when m < 1/2 ; increases as m increases when m > 1/2.
increases as m increases when m < 1/2 ; decreases as m increases when m >1/2.
